description: Try our easy to follow Crumbed Lamb Cutlets With Charred Sprouts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Crumbed Lamb Cutlets With Charred Sprouts
name: Crumbed Lamb Cutlets With Charred Sprouts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat extra oil in same pan over medium heat. Cook cutlets, in batches, for 2-3 minutes on each side for medium or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to paper towel-lined plate. Serve cutlets with mashed potato, sprouts and almonds.
